meanings.definition: The act or process of moving downward.
meanings.sent1: The descent of the ball was swift.
meanings.sent2: She watched the descent of the airplane with awe.
meanings.sent3: The descent of the elevator made everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: The descent of the sun marked the end of the day.
meanings.sent5: The descent of the waterfall was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The hikers carefully navigated the steep descent.
meanings.sent2: The skier enjoyed the thrill of the mountain descent.
meanings.sent3: The descent of the roller coaster was exhilarating.
meanings.sent4: The descent of the road was treacherous in the rain.
meanings.sent5: The descent of the hill was challenging but rewarding.

meanings.sent1: She proudly traced her family's descent.
meanings.sent2: The historian studied the royal descent of the monarch.
meanings.sent3: The descent of the family heirloom was a tale of intrigue.
meanings.sent4: The descent of the family name carried great honor.
meanings.sent5: The descent of the family tree revealed surprising connections.
